channel.title: Need help on screenshots :(
channel.description: ok i made new server ham pass one network is wraithscape pass is wraith and ip is 5.82.181.204. but nyway i took screenshot of evry1 saying its gd n stuff but how do i get on ma post? ty in advance :)

item.title: Need help on screenshots :(
item.dc:creator: @rarescape rarescape
item.description:
@rarescape wrote:

GETTING PICTURES ON YOUR THREAD!!!(i dont know how to do it on the webclient, so, i will modifiey it l8ter when i find out.Thank you for your pacients!)Ok, first you will want to have screenshots!!!Hit the F9 button to take a screenshot of the desired picture!!!Then, open up your internet, go to http://imageshack.us/ and hit browse and go into the screenshot section of the moparscape31 folder and double click witch screenshot you want to use, hit the resizeimage box to get a check in it, then, click the drop-down box, hit the 640x480, then, hit host it!then copy and paste the Thumbnail1 UNDER the picture into your thread, and, make your post, and wahla!it should give you a picture!!!

Read full topic
